title: 2.2 Acres at Madurankuliya
details: Facing 50 ft wide Mahakubukankadawela /Andigama container commutable road,Just 800 meters from Colombo -Puttalam main road. Suitable for Residence, Industrial, Export Yard or for animal husbandry. Three phase electricity and pipe-borne water available at the land. Ground water is available at 6-10 ft down. Price negotiable.
